comments.comment: Bjorn is a physical beast, being able to not just tank those punches at 1:38 but to simply laugh them off like it was nothing, and not to mention his ability to blast off like a rocket ship and fly around the kitchen.
This is like when a series ends and they time skip a bit to see how the characters are doing… truly beautiful to see this happy family

Thank you.

Last July my wife showed me a positive pregnancy test at the beginning of our summer vacation and we thought we were going to be parents for the third time. 
When July ended, so did the pregnancy and it hit me hard. 
I have two lovely children and an extraordinary wife. My family and the joy of laughter really brought me through the winter, but I would still feel sad sometimes.

Luckily my wife got pregnant again and last Tuesday we had a midterm ultrasound and we are getting a boy. 
The youngest (4y/o) said that she wants her little brother to be called Bjørn and it honestly made me smile and laugh. 
We are not going to name him Bjørn and I know it doesn’t mean anything to anyone but me but I still felt like sharing.

Thank you for getting me through some of the quiet time.

I can’t believe it. Over 15 years ago I watched this dude scream at barrels in happy wheels. He started as a gamer. He dabbled in streaming. Hit all the big numbers and records. Even weathered some scandal. And now, he retires as King emeritus of YouTube, with a family, happiness and the good life: props man. Just happy for the dude
Crazy how we got see Pewds first screaming at Timmy in happy wheels, and now playing with Björn in the playground. Its so wholesome

Pewds is living the "and they lived happily ever after" ending all these vlogs feel like aftermath to pewds, humble beginnings arc, rise to fame arc, the defending of his position on top, the bridge arc we dont talk about, the weird eras, the fitness journey, then finally retirement him just getting to live
Dude I always had a sneaking suspicion that Marzia was the one editing these. The aesthetics, camera shots, music, etc. reminds me so much of her old vlogs she used to make.
Bjorn hasn’t realized that his dad has the most batshit insane lore ever conceived in the internet
I love how most channels that post their families just try to exploit their kids and Pewds is over here just going "Look at my baby!" once every 4 months. A true dad.
This feels like a manga that posts extra chapters every now and then about the main characters’ lives after the main story ended
He is a ROUND little potato baby, how PERFECT
He's so ROUND
Man, just by looking at his face you can tell you are great parents… such a happy baby! Well done
Felix’s life seems the best. Glad to see him so happy.
9:26 Congratulations on developing the earthshaking dad sneeze technique.
it's kinda cool that bjorn will have these logs of his days as a baby that he can watch when he grows up
I love how Bjorn has a corresponding hat for every outfit
“I wish there was a way to know you're in the good old days before you've actually left them.” These are the good times my friend.
Bjorn is the most baby looking baby I’ve ever seen

Pewds, I just got out of prison from a crime I didn't commit. I was found INNOCENT by the court after 2 years. I'm so happy you're still successful and doing well, last time I watched your video was on early 2022, and now you have a loving bebe! I love you Pewds!
He raised a generation of kids and gave them a great childhood, now hes raising one kid and giving him alone a childhood to remember.
bjorn is so lucky to have the best parents ever and the best life he could ever have
Felix looks more and more like his father with each passing day. It's like looking back at his own dad's memories of playing with Felix as a baby
bro is living the happy ending from a romance anime so happy for them
I cannot tell you how much I missed Marzia's channel. her old videos, her old feminine style, the softness of it all. These vlogs have been the best. Maria editor supremacy
It’s so nice to see Felix living his best life in Japan with his family, man’s earned it
It‘s so nice the way Marzia edits the videos.. they seem a lot as life from her perspective with Felix
I like how hes so gentle with his baby
Italian mum, Swedish dad who speak English to eachother, growing up in Japan. Kid is gonna be so multilingual and a true man of culture.
He is such a good dad
Man, their son is truly blessed with such lovely parents.
This is surreal, I saw this man play spooky games when I was a small kid and now he's got his own lil gremlin. He's adorable Felix I wish him all the best

My heart hurts for the day he stops uploading completely bc I know it’s coming, but seeing how content and happy they are, the beautiful life and family they’ve built, it hurts a little less. Man is literally a legend in YouTube history
Literally can make a grown man smile with 4 midterm exams
love how Björn can now wear the sweater Marzia Made before he was born
the way he looked up at Pewds drinking the coffee makes me want to cry! What a journey it has been to grow up and see you and Marzia grow, and now Bjorn too! It truly is beautiful.
The idea of Felix and Marzia just chasing each other around their apartment in Japan is too stinking cute to me🫶🫶🫶
bjorn with the little tears  the aftermath of the sneezing incident...
This man had the most chaotic start in his career, and the most peaceful end to it.
I love how these feel like watching home videos of someone’s life rather than being forced content. You can tell baby is the focus while recording is a secondary thing.
Ok genuinely, Bjorn is one of the cutest babies I’ve ever seen
i had a really good friend who would’ve loved this :( .. may she rest in peace ️ you were her favorite youtuber ..
You know what I really love about Felix and Marzia? They have all the money, yet they don’t live in an obnoxious mansion, like so many would. They just live life. They’re so wholesome.

i went from watching this man scream at amnesia when i was 10 to having and taking care of an amazing life and family. been a while since ive checked his channel due to life. but wow. im happy for him
What an established gentleman with that moustache
that baby is so ridiculously cute like it's not even fair to the other babies
i like to imagine bjorn just watching all of these videos when he's grown up and just having the time of his life.
I love how wholesome you get with your child. Proud of you, Felix, be the best dad you can be!

Bjorn is happy for his father and mother, who are both Internet videographers.
0:13 Felix's French will always make me laugh
Not me crying over a family that I'll never meet  they're too precious and I'm so happy for them.

Glad to see Felix is finally achieving making his son cry. We know this is something you’ve been looking forward to, as you’ve consistently talked about wanting to make your children cry even before you became a Dad
Thank you pewds and marzia for giving me core memories... I hope you guys stay happy with Bjorn, Edgar and Momo
Love that he still gets this many views despite being not as active
My little girl is almost 9 months old, shes crawling, falling, laughing, crying, pointing, shouting. I couldn't be happier.
Guys, do you realize that we saw this man years ago recording gameplays and today he is a father? How quickly time passes...

ほっぺがふくふくしてて、可愛い…
見てるだけで幸せ………
16:43 that what he was training for with the microphone! What a dedication
He’s turning into a dad, he even looks like an average nordic dad.
Before becoming a proper father, PewDiePie has been a father to a generation of lost children.
Marzia's editing makes this feel like I'm watching one of those beautiful flashbacks like in anime. I love it so much
HES GROWING SO QUICKLY
Marzia's editing space is so cozy and nice
Glad to see that Felix still have that childish side while keep punching and jump scaring Bjorn, at the same time mature and being a great loving dad figure. This all just seems so surreal
It was so nice getting to see lil bits of Marzia looking happy along with the usual vlog content. Def one of my fav ones so far
Björn is 8 months old looking like a grown ass adult the way he carries himself
Björn is so very loved. It's beautiful to watch.
These videos genuinely make me so happy. Their little family so adorable and it’s just such a great feeling to see them all so happy and blessed. They deserve it so much.
Bro is making me so happy for a child I have never seen in person and isn't my own

The most beautiful thing is seeing Felix and Bjorn's love for each other grow over the months. 

Argh my heart.
Was that old friend Michael a.k.a Romanian at 7:31 ? Got a whiplash of nostalgia right there.
these vlogs always have my sobbing, seeing pewds and marzi as parents is healing something in me I never knew needed healing. I love them so mUCH

Watching Bjorn take Pewds punches like a champion and laughing is a sign of THE warrior.
God bless that baby.
7:35 and the legend of Marzia buying weird things goes on
1:35 battle brings Bjorn excitement, a true Viking warrior indeed

Bro is living life.
feeling good for him
They fact they dress bjorn like some kind of little wizard is so funny to me
8:43 looks like they're doin a bro fist so cute
You can really tell that Marzia has a pile of pugs while editing. The coziness definnitely comes through in the videos.
I WATCHED THIS MAN FROM PLAYING MINECRAFT TO HAVING A FAMILY. TIME REALLY GO FAST
This video really got me daydreaming about the future, finding that special someone, raising a kid together, and starting a fresh chapter of our lives far from where we grew up.
I'm so happy we got to see more of Marzia in this one, she's a delight to see. Felix, you've made such a sweet little family, love to see the 3 of you living your best lives in Japan!

I had my first son at around the same time you had your baby. I’m on my second now. I’ve been watching your videos since I was in middle school. We grew up different lives but ended up with the same purpose. To be a father. All of the trials. All of the meetings. All of the work. Everything we’ve done from the moment we were born was for this moment as fathers. Glad you’re doing well brother.
This was so sweet  I hope you guys are having a great time in Japan!
Japan, wife, kids, pets, house, gaming. He's living my dream. Happy for you Pewds
Every Pewdiepie vlog feels like a ghibli movie and I just catch myself smiling the entire time while watching them.  So pure.

He's got a wife, a baby, two dogs and lots of money. Living life

Edit: SO to Mr. Chair
Bjorn is seriously the cutest baby I've ever seen
She's such an amazing mum. she's so pretty, too
Watching pewds live his best life with Marzia and Bjorn and the pugs puts such a big smile on my face. He deserves this, it's beautiful.
bro helped raise most of us alongside himself, now we get to watch him raise his child with his family. crazy

Bjorn laughing and smiling!! Hes such a little angel, you both are doing such a good job with him, ive been watching you on and off since i was a child myself and i know that your son is in such good hands! He is precious and sweet and i love watching these, they warm my heart seeing you both being such amazing parents and living such a good life!! Bjorn's smile truely lights a room up, just like his parents!
It’s so crazy all of our childhood YouTubers have kids now.

Bro already completed the campain, now its enjoying the side quest.
I'm so happy for him and his family
I knew it, this is Marzia's aesthetics. She's the one editing them OMG <3
Jag hoppas att denna familj alltid förblir lycklig och fridfull, och att ingen ond ögat ska drabba den.
omg hes so cute bless his lil heart
Björn is so adorable, dont want  him to cry ️ and felix, you are such a great father!
Looking back and remembering the journey we all had with pewds and where he is rn. Its beautiful glad to be here and watch it
Seeing Bjorn and hearing his adorable soul cleansing giggles makes me want to have a baby.
